item.title: Unveiling the Magic: Visualizing Matrix Transformations
item.description: Understanding matrix transformations might seem daunting, especially if you’re not familiar with the world of mathematics. However, they are a crucial concept in many fields, including computer graphics, physics, and machine learning. By visualizing matrix transformations, we can better comprehend the seemingly complicated operations and uncover the magic behind how matrices manipulate and reshape data. The purpose of this blog post is to demonstrate simple transformations using Desmos for visualization.
